datavolley 1.2.3

    Change team names

    remap_team_names.Rd

    A team name can sometimes be spelled incorrectly, particularly if there are character encoding issues. This can be a particular problem when combining data from multiple files. A team name matching the from entry in a row in remap is renamed to the corresponding to value. If the remap object also contains a team_id column, then a team name must match the team_id and from values to be changed to the corresponding to value.

    remap_team_names(x, remap, fixed = TRUE)

    Arguments

    x

    datavolley: a datavolley object as returned by dv_read, or list of such objects

    remap

    data.frame: data.frame of strings with columns from and to, and optionally team_id

    fixed

    logical: treat the to and from entries as fixed string? (Treat as regexps if fixed is FALSE)

    Value

    datavolley object or list with corresponding team names changed

    See also

    dv_read

    Examples

    if (FALSE) {
  x <- dv_read(dv_example_file(), insert_technical_timeouts=FALSE)
  summary(x)

  ## rename a team based just on team name
  summary(remap_team_names(x, data.frame(from="Nova KBM Branik", to="NKBM Branik")))

  ## rename a team based on team name and ID
  summary(remap_team_names(x, data.frame(from="Nova KBM Branik", to="NKBM Branik", id="MB4")))
}
